alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 11:04AM EDT until May 23 at 11:15AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL COLUMBIA...NORTHEASTERN RICHMOND...SOUTHWESTERN EDGEFIELD...WEST CENTRAL AIKEN AND SOUTHEASTERN MCCORMICK COUNTIES... At 1104 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belvedere, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Martinez, Augusta, Clearwater, Belvedere, Edgefield, Glendale, Midtown, Summerville, Augusta Mall, Daniel Field, Village Plaza Shopping Center, Augusta National Golf Club, Gloverville, Graniteville, Burnettown, West End Augusta, Poverty Hill and Glenn Hills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 197 and 201. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 13. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Strom Thurmond move away from the water and take shelter!
